opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Eagen, Mr. Justice O’Brien and Mr. Justice Roberts dissent.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Caplan et al., Appellants, v. Option Supply Company.
Argued November 20, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
petition for reargument refused May 18, 1970.
Harold R. Schmidt, with him Roger Curran, Robert L. Zeman, and Rose, Schmidt and Diwon, and Zeman <£ Zeman, for appellants.
Wallace E. Edgecombe, with him Royston, Robb, Leonard, Edgecombe, Miller & Shorall, for appellees.
April 22, 1970:
